DADOS-GERAIS.NOME-EM-CITACOES-BIBLIOGRAFICAS: MENEZES NETO, A.;Menezes-Neto, Armando;NETO, ARMANDO DE MENEZES;DE MENEZES-NETO, ARMANDO

RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Bilogo, Bacharel em Bioqumica e Imunologia do curso de Cincias Biolgicas da UFMG (2005), Mestre (2006-2008) e Doutor (2008-2012) em Cincias da Sade pelo Instituto Ren Rachou (IRR-FIOCRUZ). Realizou estgio ps-Doutoral no Instituto de Sade Global de Barcelona (ISGlobal) no grupo do Dr. Hernando del Portillo (2013-2015), onde iniciou pesquisas com vesculas extracelulares (VEs). De 2015 a 2016, foi ps-Doutor vinculado do grupo do Dr. Rodrigo Soares, pesquisador do Instituto Ren Rachou (IRR-FIOCRUZ), trabalhando com exoglicobiologia de tripanossomatdeos. Atualmente, bolsista de ps-doutorado no Instituto Aggeu Magalhes (IAM-FIOCRUZ), no grupo do Dr. Rafael Frana, desenvolvendo projeto de pesquisa com VEs no contexto das arboviroses humanas. Tem experincia com biologia celular e molecular, biologia computacional e protemica. Sua pesquisa se dedica compreenso do papel das vesculas extracelulares na patogenia causada por infeces com arboviroses, especialmente o vrus Zika. membro do Grupo Espanhol de Inovao e Pesquisa em Vesculas Extracelulares (GEIVEX) e da International Society for Extracellular Vesicles (ISEV).
RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH-EN: Biologist, with a major in Biochemistry and Immunology by UFMG (2005), Masters (2006-2008) and Doctorate (2008-2012) in Health Sciences at Rene Rachou Institute (IRR-FIOCRUZ). Held a Postdoctoral fellowship at the Barcelona Institute for Global Health (ISGlobal) in the group of Dr. Hernando del Portillo (2013-2015), where he began his research on extracellular vesicles (EVs). From 2015 to 2016, was a postDoctoral fellow associated to Dr. Rodrigo Soares? group at Rene Rachou Institute (IRR-FIOCRUZ), working with exoglycobiology of trypanosomatids. Currently, holds a post-Doctoral fellowship at Aggeu Magalhaes Institute (IAM-FIOCRUZ), in the group of Dr. Rafael Frana, researching EVs in the context of human arboviruses. His expertise fields are molecular and cellular biology, computational biology and proteomics. His research interest is the understanding of the role EVs play in the pathogeny caused by arboviral infections, especially the Zika virus. Holds memberships of the Spanish Group for Innovation and Research on Extracellular Vesicles (GEIVEX) and the International Society for Extracellular Vesicles (ISEV).

OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES: Representante Discente do Programa de Ps-graduao em Cincias da Sade do Centro de Pesquisas Ren Rachou/FIOCRUZ (2008-2010)

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: Estudo de coorte prospectivo sobre a persistncia do vrus Zika nos fluidos corporais de pacientes com infeco pelo vrus Zika
PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO-INGLES: This is a prospective observational cohort study (NCT03106714). Participants were followed up for 12 months, to assess reactivation or reinfection at longer time intervals. Specimens collected at pre-established intervals and tested for ZIKV RNA by RT-PCR were blood, semen, vaginal secretions, saliva, tears, sweat, urine, rectal swab, and breast milk.
